title: Forum posts won't refresh.
body: Everytime I come on the forums, I have to close explorer and relog in to see updated posts. This isn't the case all the time, but most of the time if I post something, it doesn't come up and refresh for me in the forums without a complete relog/ reopen explorer. Sometimes, I will have "Player recruitment" Open and I refresh and the posts will say "4 hours ago".  Also, pretty much all of the time my inbox for comments on my post don't refresh without a relog either. Please help!

replies.body: Hmmmmm that's a little strange to be sure. Your browser might actually be grabbing all of that data from its cookies when it's refreshed, so you may not be getting 100% accurate refreshes. Let's try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) really quickly to see if that helps!

I have mine set so everything is cleared everytime I close out explorer. The issue must be around that maybe.. cause that is how things refresh on here... This post for example... I had to reclick "New" in "Help & Support" twice to see the post I made... it says there is a reply, I click on the post and its not there.. I had to look in "My Updates" on my account to direct me to see your comment.
Again, had to click New twice to see my post.. it isn't even bumped to first on the list.. and right now as I type this comment, after the above comment.. it says my post has 0 comments...
